ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research was funded by the U.S. Department of the Interior via the Bureau of Reclamation (USBR-R15AC00003) and the Southwest Climate Adaptation Science Center (G18AC00320), as well as by the California Department of Water Resources (4600010378 UCOP2-11), the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (MCA 20151755) and by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration’s Regional Integrated Sciences and Assessments (RISA) California–Nevada Climate Applications Program award NA17OAR4310284. Three anonymous reviewers provided valuable constructive comments that resulted in an improved manuscript.
